titleInfo.title: The Rise of Welfare Service States – Conceptual challenges of an ambiguous welfare settlement and the need for new policy research

mods.abstract: This paper sums up the reasoning for a Welfare Service State and offers an outline of conceptual challenges associated with a service-based welfare architecture.
